indicationsName: 胃潰瘍、十二指腸潰瘍、急慢性胃炎。

packageUnit.packageSpec: 0.5公斤以上塑膠袋裝，置入紙桶/箱內

ingredientsDesc:
Aldioxa is a condensation product of allantoin and aluminum hydroxide.
When dried, it contains not less than 65.3% and not more than 74.3% of allantoin (C4H6N4O3：158.12), and not less than 11.1% and not more than 13.0% of aluminum (Al：26.98).
